sentences.sContent: She liked to be home to greet Steve when he came in from school.
sentences.sCn: 当史蒂夫从学校回来时，她喜欢在家迎接他。

synos.tran: 欢迎，迎接；致敬，致意；映入眼帘

remMethod.val: 见面 (meet) 的时候互致问候 (greet)

words.tran: （在酒店、超市等门口迎接顾客的）接待员

trans.tranOther: When you greet someone, you say "Hello" or shake hands with them
